name: PAT_GROUP_CLINICAL
description: This table contains clinical information specific to patients that attended a given group therapy session.

columns.name: PAT_GROUP_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the group record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: LIST_OF_CONTACTS
columns.description: This column stores the list of patient contacts for the group.

columns.name: CSN_DOC_DONE_YN
columns.description: This item determines if the documentation for a given contact in a group is complete.

columns.name: GENERATED_NOTE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of each patient's individual note for the group session. These notes are generated by the system.

columns.name: LINKED_PAT_ID
columns.description: This item stores the patient ID for each patient for the group session.

columns.name: LINKED_EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This item stores the ID of each patient's linked episode for the group session.
